ygData.subject: RE: General for Evil races
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Cronik [mailto:rich.hitz@worldnet.att.net] Everfrost has the merchants in the tunnel Barbarian newbie zone. Steamfont has many merchants Gnome newbie
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Cronik [mailto:rich.hitz@...]


Everfrost has the merchants in the tunnel

Barbarian newbie zone.

Steamfont has many merchants

Gnome newbie zone.

Butcherblock has many merchants

Dwarf newbie zone.

Greater Fay has the entire city of Kelethin open to Wood and High elves

High elf and wood elf newbie zone.

Qeynos Hills has the house in the middle

Qeynos and Surefall Glade newbie zone.

Misty Thicket has the halfling huts

Halfling newbie zone.

Lesser Fay has the Ranger camp
The Commonlands...
Kithicor...
The Karanas ....

The above are valid complaints, however in general the design (as I
perceive it) is such that being evil has a pretty significant price attached
to it in terms of convenience.

Brian
